_header: In our gospel says Matthew / That Christs deeds til us will show
Note: For the text in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 6360
_description: Gospel for Nineteenth Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN vre gospel seiþ MatheuÞat mony of cristes dedes
                    kneu…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And aftur in helle wiþ þe fendeþer þei
                    schul dwelle wiþ outen ende
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
IN oure gospell of saynte matheweþat cristes dedes will vs
                    schewe…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þat may i schew ȝow be a taleþat i to ȝow
                    now tell sale
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Matheu sais in oure godspelleAls I ȝowe wille on
                    englisch telle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat may we se by þis taleÞat I til ȝowe
                    nowe telle sale
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xixapost festum trinitatis secundum Mathium (p.
                    316)

CULDd11.First Lines:
…In þis schip passid crist þe se& com in to his
                    owne cyte…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& þat may we seen be þis taleÞat I to
                    ȝow now tellin schale

CULGg531.First Lines:
In oure gospell says mathewþat crystes dedys tyll vs wyll
                    schew…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe he[r] by a taleþat I right now tell
                    sale
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
dominica xixma secundum Matheum (f. 136v,
                    followed by two lines Latin scripture)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
IN vre gospel say seint MatheuÞat Mony of cristes dedes
                    knew…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And aftur in helle with þe fendeÞere þei schul
                    dwelle withouten ende

Digital Facsimile of British Library MS Add. 22283 (‘Simeon’).

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
In owre gospell says saynte matheweÞat crist dedes to ws wyll
                    schewe…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Þat I may schew ȝow by a tayllÞat I to
                    ȝow now tell sall

MinULZ822.First Lines:
IN oure gospell says sant Mathewþat many of crystes dedes
                    knewe…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þat may ȝe se be a taleþat I now tell ȝow
                    sall

HunHM129.First Lines:
In oure gospell said mathewÞat many off cristys dedis
                    knew…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe se by a taleÞat ryght now I tell
                    schalle
